title: Rich and spicy potato soup
ingredients: ['2 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 onion, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '30g margarine', '115g chopped ham', '1 tablespoon chopped green chillies', '1/4 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '415ml chicken stock', '1 egg yolk, beaten', '4 tablespoons double cream', '60g grated Cheddar cheese']
